title: State v. Ronnie Long – Addendum 2 – At Cross Purposes
description:
March 22, 2018 / Host, Jon Cryer, Rabia Chaudry, Colin Miller, and guest Connie Walker discuss the Ronnie Long case and Season 2 of Missing & Murdered. 

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

Today’s Addendum is sponsored by Squarespace and Casefile Podcast.

Head to www.SquareSpace.com for a free trial and use offer code UNDISCLOSED to save 10% when you’re ready to launch!

Search and subscribe to Casefile today and Apple podcasts or wherever you listen to your favorite shows.

#undisclosed #udaddendum #freeronnielong
